column1: Smoque BBQ////After watching and hearing many great reviews of Smoque BBQ
column2: my parents and I decided to give this place a try.  The last time I had BBQ was on my way back from Florida where we stopped at this BBQ joint in Savannah
column3: Georgia which had just about the absolute BEST ribs I've ever had in my life.  Unfortunately I cannot say the same about Smoque BBQ.
